message.name: ERR_USERWORKSPACE_FV_VALUE_MUST_BE_WHOLE_POSITIVE_NUMBER
message.locale: You have input an invalid number. The number must be a whole positive number.

message.name: ERR_USERWORKSPACE_FV_SUPERVISOR_NOT_OWN_QUEUE_CANNOT_REMOVE_SUBSCRIPTION
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to remove the user's subscription from this work queue.

message.name: ERR_USERWORKSPACE_XRV_WORK_QUEUE_ALLOW_USER_SUBSCRIPTION_FALSE_CANNOT_SUBSCRIBE
message.locale: Only the work queue administrator can subscribe users to this work queue.

message.name: ERR_USERWORKSPACE_XRV_WORK_QUEUE_ALLOW_USER_SUBSCRIPTION_FALSE_CANNOT_UNSUBSCRIBE
message.locale: You do not own this work queue and as the allow user subscription flag for this work queue is set to false, you cannot therefore un-subscribe the specified user from this work queue.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_SUBSCRIPTION_XRV_SUPERVISOR_SENSITIVITY_CHECK
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate sensitivity level to subscribe users to this work queue.

message.name: INF_ALL_TASKS_ASSIGNED_TO_USER_HAVE_BEEN_RESERVED
message.locale: Only "%1n" tasks were assigned to this user. All tasks have been reserved.

message.name: INF_ALL_TASKS_ASSIGNED_TO_WORK_QUEUE_HAVE_BEEN_RESERVED
message.locale: Only "%1n" tasks were assigned to this work queue. All tasks have been reserved.

message.name: INF_NO_WORK_QUEUES_OWNED_BY_SUPERVISOR
message.locale: You do not own, or have privileges to subscribe the user to a work queue.

message.name: INF_USER_ALREADY_SUBSCRIBED_TO_ALL_SUPERVISOR_WORK_QUEUES
message.locale: The user is already subscribed to all work queues that you own, or have privileges to subscribe users to.

message.name: INF_TASK_RESERVED_TO_USER
message.locale: Task %1n has been reserved to the user.
